column5: Just a question . I would rather a long weekend rather than a day off in the middle of the week?  What are you guys doing?  Im thinking work Friday and back at it(work) Wednesday....?
I took off half day Thursday, Friday,Monday back to work Wednesday, but I'll be leaving for New Brunswick Thursday afternoon!
Trying to get sat to tues off... Already have a cottage booked
leaving sat am, back tues night, family camping and fishing
Taking Monday and Tuesday off, maybe the whole week.
Booked the Monday off, 4 day weekend!

Work gave us the monday off so I will be hitting the cottage from Fri afternoon until Tuesday. I still would have taken Monday off vaca if needed. My wife is going to have to use a vaca day for the monday.  Hope everyone has a great long weekend!
But I'm always off ? Don't notice holidays these days except for higher gas prices.
Give me week days off any time. Lakes quieter. Retired now, I fish week days.
Taking the whole week off  But I think it should always be on a long weekend.lets celebrate  the event not the date.
